hero.title: Our Calculators
hero.subtitle: Free tools with no sign-up to help you better manage your daily finances.
calc.budget.title: Monthly Budget
calc.budget.desc: Easily analyze your monthly budget to balance income and expenses. Take control of your finances.
calc.savings.title: Automatic Savings
calc.savings.desc: Simulate your savings by setting a regular amount. Visualize how to reach your financial goals.
calc.tip.title: Tip Calculator
calc.tip.desc: Quickly calculate the tip and total of your bill. Perfect for meals with friends.
calc.split.title: Bill Splitting
calc.split.desc: Split the bill fairly among friends. Include the tip and divide easily.
calc.smallexp.title: Small Expenses Savings
calc.smallexp.desc: Discover the cumulative impact of your repeated habits. Save without depriving yourself.
calc.compound.title: Compound Interest
calc.compound.desc: Visualize how your savings grow exponentially with the power of compound interest over time.
calc.income.title: Income Tax
calc.income.desc: Estimate your income tax based on your income and family quotient. Discover your effective rate.
